title: Google\Cloud\Video\Transcoder\V1\TextStream
name: TextStream
description:
Encoding of a text stream. For example, closed captions or subtitles.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.video.transcoder.v1.TextStream

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.codec
params.description: The codec for this text stream. The default is webvtt. Supported text codecs: - srt - ttml - cea608 - cea708 - webvtt

params.name: data.mapping
params.description: The mapping for the Job.edit_list atoms with text EditAtom.inputs.
